title.value: scSemiProfiler: Advancing Large-scale Single-cell Studies through Semi-profiling with Deep Generative Models and Active Learning
title.justification: The title of the paper clearly states the main focus and the key methodologies employed.
title.quote: "scSemiProfiler: Advancing Large-scale Single-cell Studies through Semi-profiling with Deep Generative Models and Active Learning"

extractions.description: The paper introduces 'scSemiProfiler', a computational framework designed to enhance large-scale single-cell studies by integrating deep generative models with active learning techniques to provide accurate and cost-effective single-cell profiles. The framework focuses on using bulk sequencing data along with targeted single-cell sequencing from representative samples to perform detailed single-cell level profiling.

type.justification: The paper validates the proposed scSemiProfiler framework through extensive empirical evaluations across multiple datasets, demonstrating its accuracy and cost-effectiveness.
type.quote: "Extensive validation across heterogeneous datasets verifies the precision of our semi-profiling approach, aligning closely with true single-cell profiling data and empowering refined cellular analyses."

name.justification: The primary focus of the paper is on improving single-cell sequencing methodologies through computational techniques.
name.quote: "Single-cell sequencing is a crucial tool for dissecting the cellular intricacies of complex diseases..."

name.justification: The paper employs deep generative models to infer single-cell profiles from bulk sequencing and representative single-cell data.
name.quote: "This tool effectively integrates active learning techniques with deep generative neural network algorithms, aiming to provide single-cell resolution data at a more affordable price."

name.justification: The scSemiProfiler framework incorporates active learning strategies to intelligently select the most informative samples for single-cell sequencing.
name.quote: "scSemiProfiler ’s active learning module integrates information from the deep learning model and bulk data, intelligently selecting the most informative samples for actual single-cell sequencing."

name.justification: The framework combines bulk sequencing data with representative single-cell sequencing for comprehensive analysis.
name.quote: "combining actual single-cell sequencing data from a representative sample with bulk sequencing data, encompassing both the target and the representative sample."

name.justification: The main model proposed in the paper, integrating deep generative models and active learning.
name.quote: "scSemiProfiler, an innovative computational framework that marries deep generative model with active learning strategies."

is_contributed.justification: The model is introduced and thoroughly evaluated within the scope of this paper.
is_contributed.quote: "we introduce the single-cell Semi-profiler (scSemiProfiler). This innovative computational tool is crafted to significantly improve the precision and depth of single-cell analysis."

is_executed.justification: The model is executed and validated on multiple datasets to show its effectiveness.
is_executed.quote: "Through comprehensive evaluations across a variety of datasets, scSemiProfiler has consistently delivered high-quality semi-profiled single-cell data."

is_compared.justification: The performance of scSemiProfiler is compared with other deconvolution methods.
is_compared.quote: "In our comprehensive analysis of cell deconvolution methods, we meticulously compared scSemiProfiler with several leading-edge techniques, including CIBERSORTx, Bisque, Scaden, TAPE, and DWLS."

referenced_paper_title.justification: The model is a new contribution of the present paper.

name.justification: The dataset is used extensively to test the performance of scSemiProfiler in generating semi-profiled single-cell data.
name.quote: "we utilized a COVID-19 cohort single-cell sequencing dataset [35]. After quality controls, this dataset includes 124 samples, including healthy controls and infected patients of different severity levels: asymptomatic, mild, moderate, severe, or critical."

referenced_paper_title.value: Single-cell multi-omics analysis of the immune response in COVID-19
referenced_paper_title.justification: The referenced paper describes the dataset used for evaluation.
referenced_paper_title.quote: "we utilized a COVID-19 cohort single-cell sequencing dataset [35]."

name.justification: The dataset is validated against scSemiProfiler to determine its effectiveness in handling heterogeneity.
name.quote: "We further tested the effectiveness of scSemiProfiler by validating it against a notably heterogeneous colorectal cancer dataset [53]."

referenced_paper_title.value: Single-cell and bulk transcriptome sequencing identify two epithelial tumor cell states, and refine the consensus molecular classification of colorectal cancer
referenced_paper_title.justification: The cited source describes this single-cell dataset.
referenced_paper_title.quote: "We further tested the effectiveness of scSemiProfiler by validating it against a notably heterogeneous colorectal cancer dataset [53]."

name.justification: This dataset includes both single-cell and bulk RNA measurements used to validate the model’s adaptability in real-world applications.
name.quote: "we directed our analysis towards the iMGL dataset [60], which uniquely profiles both single-cell and real bulk RNA-seq measurements for the human inducible pluripotent stem cell (iPSC)-derived microglia-like (iMGL) cells."

referenced_paper_title.value: Transcriptional characterization of iPSC-derived microglia as a model for therapeutic development in neurodegeneration
referenced_paper_title.justification: The cited source describes this single-cell dataset.
referenced_paper_title.quote: "we directed our analysis towards the iMGL dataset [60] ... The availability of such datasets, which include both single-cell and bulk sequencing data on a large scale, remains very limited."

name.justification: PyTorch is used for developing the VAE-GAN model in the study.
name.quote: "We constructed a VAE-GAN-based model using PyTorch."

referenced_paper_title.value: PyTorch: An imperative style, high-performance deep learning library
referenced_paper_title.justification: This is the reference for the PyTorch library used in the study.

name.justification: SCANPY is used for various processing steps including UMAP visualization and PCA.
name.quote: "Subsequently, the Uniform Manifold Approximation and Projection (UMAP) and PCA functionalities within SCANPY were used for the visualization and dimension reduction process."

referenced_paper_title.value: Scanpy: large-scale single-cell gene expression data analysis
referenced_paper_title.justification: This is the reference for the SCANPY library used in the study.

name.justification: CellChat is used for the cell-cell interaction analyses.
name.quote: "we conducted cell-cell interaction analyses on both real-profiled and semi-profiled datasets using the R package CellChat."

referenced_paper_title.value: Inference and analysis of cell-cell communication using CellChat
referenced_paper_title.justification: This is the reference for the CellChat library used in the study.

name.justification: Monocle3 is used for pseudotime analysis on both real-profiled and semi-profiled data.
name.quote: "We carried out pseudotime analysis utilizing the Monocle3 R package."

referenced_paper_title.value: The single-cell transcriptional landscape of mammalian organogenesis
referenced_paper_title.justification: This is the reference for the Monocle3 library used in the study.
